name: ExecuteOCCActivity
description: Queue an activity in an Orckestra Commerce Cloud environment and wait for its completion.
author: Orckestra Technologies Inc.

inputs.name: ocsHostName
inputs.label: OCS Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The domain name of the OCS-CM component (e.g.: ocscm.ENV.CLIENTCODE.orckestra.cloud)

inputs.name: ocsAuthenticationToken
inputs.label: Authentication Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token used to authenticate with the Orckestra Commerce Cloud platform. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#executeocc-auth-token).

inputs.name: correlationId
inputs.label: Correlation Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: A value used to group multiple executions of the activity.

inputs.name: taskName
inputs.label: Task Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Orckestra Commerce task display name.

inputs.name: activityTypeName
inputs.label: Activity Type Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The activity type name including .Net namespace. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#executeocc-activity-type-name).

inputs.name: taskInputs
inputs.label: Task Inputs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input arguments for the Activity Type specified above. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#executeocc-task-inputs).
